package.name: feathers.display
package.shortDescription: A variety of custom Starling display objects.

package.name: feathers.textures
package.shortDescription: Textures for custom Starling display objects.

package.name: feathers.controls.popups
package.shortDescription: Managers for the display of pop-up sub-components.

package.name: feathers.core
package.shortDescription: Base classes and interfaces used by Feathers.

package.name: feathers.data
package.shortDescription: Collections used by Feathers to display data.

package.name: feathers.dragDrop
package.shortDescription: Classes related to drag and drop operations.

package.name: feathers.events
package.shortDescription: Contains classes to related to Feathers events.

package.name: feathers.layout
package.shortDescription: A variety of layout algorithms used to customize Feathers controls and containers.

package.name: feathers.skins
package.shortDescription: Classes related to skinning and themes in Feathers.

package.name: feathers.text
package.shortDescription: Contains classes for working with text.

package.name: feathers.motion
package.shortDescription: Classes related to motion, tweens, and animation.

package.name: feathers.motion.transitions
package.shortDescription: A variety of animated transitions used by the ScreenNavigator component.

package.name: feathers.system
package.shortDescription: Higher level queries for system-level capabilities.

package.name: feathers.utils.display
package.shortDescription: Utilities for working with display objects.
